Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, south of the Highland Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Highland Stables are located on the north side of the road, the entrance to which is located on the east side, off of Highland Avenue. On the south side of the road, you can see the large City Walls, standing proud to protect the city from all forms of invasion. Oceancrest has remained free for centuries and plans to stay that way.
